channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024080737
item.description:
Report X-2024080737

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-14T15:13:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-09
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Brandon Hecker, 130 Operations Supervisor, contacted Safety regarding a UN1999, Tars, Liquid on the trailer floor and on the pallet located on the dock floor. Brandon advised while unloading the trailer, the spill was found. Brandon stated he believes it happened in-transit or punctured from the pre vious terminal. Brandon stated he's unable to tell if it was punctured due to the tar on the Pail. Kim with Cura was contacted for remediation.

item.title: Report X-2024080619
item.description:
Report X-2024080619

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-14T15:13:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: LAKE HAVASU CITY
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN ONE 36 VOLT 10.4 AMP ALUMINUM REPLACEMENT LITHIUM-ION BATTERY PACK FOR AN E-BIKE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM ARIZONA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER V08627, ALLCO MANUFACTURING, INC., 1604 15TH ST SW, AUBURN WA 98001-6565. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
